channel.title: Deployment Guide on My AWS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Deployment Guide on My AWS Workshop

item.title: Amazon Elasticsearch
item.description: Deployment Steps with CDK Install and bootstrap AWS CDK Please skip this step if you already have CDK installed and bootstrapped. npm install -g aws-cdk npm install -g typescript cdk bootstrap aws://YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID/YOUR_AWS_REGION Deploying CDK project Clone the repository from Github git clone git@github.com:amazon-connect/amazon-connect-call-quality-monitoring.git Move into the directory of the stack which will deploy the resources cd Amazon-connect-monitoring/monitoring-stack-cdk Set your CCP URL (required) and SAML URL (optional) export CCP_URL=YOURURL

item.title: Splunk
item.description: Deployment Steps with CDK Install and bootstrap AWS CDK Please skip this step if you already have CDK installed and bootstrapped. npm install -g aws-cdk npm install -g typescript cdk bootstrap aws://YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID/YOUR_AWS_REGION Deploying CDK project Clone the repository from Github git clone git@github.com:amazon-connect/amazon-connect-call-quality-monitoring.git Move into the directory of the stack which will deploy the resources cd Amazon-connect-monitoring/monitoring-stack-cdk Set your CCP URL (required) and SAML URL (optional) export CCP_URL=YOURURL
